title: Data Model Dictionary Schema
description: Comprehensive data dictionary following 2025 data governance best practices. Supports modern metadata management, data lineage tracking, privacy compliance, and semantic layer definitions with automated data discovery and classification.

metadata.description: Data dictionary metadata and governance information

metadata.name: E-commerce Data Dictionary
metadata.description: Comprehensive data dictionary for e-commerce platform

entities.name: Customer
entities.businessDefinition: A person or organization that purchases products from our platform

attributes.name: customerId
attributes.businessDefinition: System-generated unique ID for each customer

attributes.name: email
attributes.businessDefinition: Primary contact email for customer communication

relationships.name: orders
relationships.businessDescription: All orders placed by this customer

indexes.name: idx_customer_email
indexes.description: Unique index on email for fast lookups

policies.name: PII Protection Policy
rules: PII must be encrypted at rest

glossary.definition: A person or organization that purchases products from our platform
examples: Registered user who made a purchase
